PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03442022-04-06,  ,  ,  ,  IRCC,  PS,  CBSA
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Electronic Travel Authorization)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (ELECTRONIC TRAVEL AUTHORIZATION) in order to exempt lawful permanent residents of the United States from the requirement to obtain an electronic travel authorization before flying to Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0080 Publication Date: 2022-04-27
AttachmentsAttachment
